selection(boolean) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.gameLogic.controller.InitController
Handles a player boolean decision in the first phases, can act differently based on the current state of the controller: - in NEW_PLAYER select the modality - in SP_CONFIGURATION_CHOOSE select if you want to play with standard configuration - in MP_CONFIGURATION_CHOOSE select if you want to play with standard configuration - in RECONNECTION select if you want to reconnect to the match, if meanwhile someone else has reconnected to the same match go to LOGIN phase.

Gets the boolean choice by the userData associate with the button and sends a BinarySelectionMessage to the server.

startGame() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.gameLogic.controller.InitController

When called two times, sends a SwitchShelfMessage asking for a switch between the two sources that has called this method
SwitchShelfMessage - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.network.message.ctosmessage
This class implements a message from the client to switch two shelves Message structure: { nickname, the number of the first shelf, the number of the second shelf }
SwitchShelfMessage(String, int, int) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.network.message.ctosmessage.SwitchShelfMessage
Constructor of a switch shelf message.
